Add some to view progress Click on the + button to add a subject" OK Settings Look & Feel Dynamic color, Dark theme, Language Dark theme System On Off Additional settings Auto update Check for updates automatically About Contributors and support High contrast dark mode Pitch black dark theme for devices with OLED display Dynamic colors Automatically set the app theme according to the device wallpaper Haptics & Vibration Interactive haptics for touch feedback Default language Change the default language of the app Lead developer Just a guy who loves apps and design Like what I do?
Consider buying me a coffee App Version Changelogs History of all the changes made to the app No changelog found for this version Feature request If you have any ideas or suggestions for the app, let us know Report issue Report any issue or bug you have encountered while using the app License Learn about the license this app is using Github Visit the github repository of the app Select Permission not granted. Please allow app installation from unknown sources. Customisation Customise certain UI elements to your liking Subject card style Subject name Adjust card corner radius Enable auto update Update channel Check for updates Update available ! Latest version Current version Download Download failed Stable What's new! Network error Request timeout Enable direct apk download When turned on, updates will be downloaded directly from Github inside the app. Turn off to visit the Github releases page for manual download instead. Click on the download button to get the latest version of Driftly from the github repository. Pre-release Pre-release builds may be unstable Behavior Remember calendar month and year Turn on this option to remember the last viewed month for every subject Show attendance streaks If enabled, attendance streaks will be shown on the calendar Modify certain behavior of the app Reset to current month Previous month Next month Back button This month data All months data Last backup time Last backup date Please pick a file with .driftly extension Backup found The data in the saved file will override the current data. Calendar Backup and restore Backup and restore app settings and other data Backup app settings Backup app settings preferences only Backup Restore Backup app database Backup app database which includes the subjects data including their attendance records Backup all data Backup all data of the app Restore app data Restore app data from the saved backup file.
The saved database will overwrite the current database Reset This action is irreversible! Reset app settings Reset app settings to default values Backup successful Backup failed Restore successful Restore failed Updates Reminder to mark attendance Receive a daily notification to remind you to mark your attendance You might have forgot to mark your attendance today! Attendance Daily reminder to mark attendance Mark your attendance Don't forget to mark your attendance today! Reset settings successful Reset settings failed Notifications Customise notification settings of the app Enable notifications Notify missed attendance Receive notifications when an attendance is missed Start week on Monday Notify when update available Receive notifications when a newer version of Driftly is released A newer version of Driftly has been released! Request permission Grant permission Do you want to get alerts when you forget to mark your attendance?

Grant notification access! Prefer seeing your week begin with Monday instead of Sunday? Enable this to shift the calendar layout so Monday becomes the first day of the week. These versions are still in testing and may contain unfinished features or unexpected bugs. If you choose to update to a pre-release, please be aware that things might break or behave strangely.
If you encounter any issues, crashes, or weird behavior, please report them so we can fix and improve Driftly before the stable release.
Thanks for helping us build better! Initial release
Added calendar to mark attendance status
Added per subject progress display
Added ability to add, remove and edit subjects
Added settings for customising user experience Fixed some color values in color palette selection
Fixed some UI margins
Added prerelease build update checker Improved color scheme in high contrast dark theme
Added what's new bottomsheet to show changelogs after an update
Code optimisations Added behavior settings to modify certain app behavior
Added option to remember the last viewed month
Added option to turn off attendance streak visuals in calendar Switched some UI components to material expressive theme
Added option to make Monday as first day of the week in the Calendar
Added option to directly download the latest updated apk inside the app without the need to visit the Github repository
Fixed many UI inconsistencies Added option to backup and restore app data locally
Localised hardcoded strings
Minor ui improvements Fixed an issue where restoring backup failed in some devices Added notification alerts for various events like attendance reminder, missed attendance alert and notification alert when new version of the app is detected
Improved the batch selection of subject cards in home screen with support to dismiss selection by back press
Fixed system bars colors in android 11 and below
